function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to health hazards in the built environment during Covid-19 lockdowns","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases and health inequality","Mitigation":"Improving safety and health regulations in the built environment, promoting awareness of health hazards, and providing support for vulnerable individuals","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, air purification systems, and contact tracing technology","People":"People living in crowded or unsafe housing conditions, vulnerable individuals, and those at risk of health inequality","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Neglect of safety hazards in dwellings causing anxiety and injury","Impact":"Increased risk of physical and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Implementing safety regulations and inspections, providing resources for addressing safety hazards, and promoting mental health support services","Technologies":"Smart home safety systems, building safety inspections, and mental health support apps","People":"Residents living in dwellings with safety hazards, individuals affected by poor mental health, and those experiencing anxiety","Owner":"Property owners, landlords, and mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of social gradient in harm within different welfare regimes","Impact":"Unequal distribution of harm, including rates of obesity, suicide, homicide, and accidents","Mitigation":"Addressing social determinants of health, promoting equitable welfare policies, and enforcing regulations to reduce harm","Technologies":"Social determinants of health assessment tools, data analytics for policy evaluation, and welfare program management systems","People":"People affected by social inequality, individuals with poor access to healthcare, and communities with unequal welfare support","Owner":"Policy makers, government agencies, and organizations advocating for social equity"}]}
